ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 12
ComicInfo.Summary: Chapter 12: Red Hood, Two-Face, and Solomon Grundy face off against Bloom, Gotham, and Gotham Girl in a final confrontation to stop Bloom's plans for profiting from the Lazarus Resin.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:49:34. [Issue ID 2434960]
